New Records: CJ McCollum scored 50 points, matching his career high and one of the greatest offensive performances in Pelicans history
CJ McCollum made 10 three-point baskets, nearly matching his own team record of 11 threes
Key Match Events: CJ McCollum's 50-point eruption was a turning point in the game, leading the Pelicans to a 132-120 win over the Wizards
CJ McCollum's outstanding performance ended an 11-game losing streak for the Pelicans
Pre-Game Insights: CJ McCollum told New Orleans coaches that he would be at 40 percent accuracy from three-point range in 10 days
CJ McCollum's recent shooting performance had improved to 37 percent from beyond the arc
Post-Match Reflections: CJ McCollum expressed gratitude for the extra time he's spent in the practice gym leading to his memorable night
CJ McCollum noted that his family provides clear motivation for his success
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in the Smoothie King Center
CJ McCollum's 50 points tied him with Denver’s Nikola Jokic and Oklahoma City’s Shai Gilgeous-Alexander as the NBA’s leading scorer over the last four games
Others: The game ended an 11-game losing streak for the Pelicans
CJ McCollum's performance was described as 'vintage' and 'dope' by teammate Trey Murphy
